source.4c9caa3b: import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)
source.7a8e6c72: The second and last step is the usage of "read_csv" function, passing the source url as first input.
source.a52a5503:
In this brief tutorial I'll show how to easily download an open Csv from Github.

The example is based on data about Covid19 in Italy.


I'll make use of **pandas "read_csv" method**, so I just import pandas.
source.7d463f7c:
The first step is the definition of the **source url**.

Note that this must be the url of the raw version of the file. You can get this url in the search bar just by clicking the "raw" button.
source.3d1d83ba: # Tutorial: How to download a Csv from Github
